Pride and Progress: San FranciscoNews â€“ highlights:1. With Casey Ward and Korey McCormack2. GCN celebrates its 1st anniversary.3. Ward and McCormack discuss recent events affecting the gay and lesbian community.4. Happy Valentine's Day, from GCNCOMMERCIAL: SF AIDS Foundation5. Ward and McCormack continue discussing recent events.6. Discussion of a West Virginia Supreme Court case regarding a lesbian teacher7. Interview with Irene Smith, massage therapist for people with AIDS8. Speakers with San Francisco AIDS Foundation discuss impact of AIDS on women.9. Report on Bishop William E. Swing regarding church liturgies for same-sex unions.10. Report on Dutch National Broadcasting Corporation creation of gay and lesbian [teletext] service.
The Right Stuff:1. With Karen Ripley2. This Week in Gay History with Jeff Bixby3. Happy Valentine's Day, from GCNCOMMERCIAL: Shanti Project, with Michael and Paula Smuin4. Interview with Nancy Yerby, who talks about macrobiotic nutrition5. Interview with Michael Prince, who talks about his music career and his single "Dance Your Love Away". Includes clip of music video.6. Happy Valentine's Day, from GCN7. Karen Ripley being comedic8. Promotion of "Poetry & Well-Being" to benefit ACL's free art classes for people with AIDS9. Interview with Frank Pike, who talks about his business Moonlighting Escorts.10. Just Ask RazCOMMERCIAL: Cook's MagazineCOMMERCIAL: The Best of "Money, Money, Money"
